The specific aim propose study : ( 1 ) To develop algorithm predict gestational age delivery 26 42 week ' gestation ALCV key biophysical parameter ( 2 ) To evaluate performance ALCV biophysical parameter-based gestational age estimate . Specifically , hypothesize accuracy predictive algorithm comparable commonly use measure gestational age dating ( ±2 day ) good precision ( ±14 day ) commonly use measure gestational age dating .
DOC.brief_title: Smartphone Ophthalmoscope Lens Vascularity Estimate Gestational Age
DOC.detailed_description: Postnatal gestational age date method need low/middle income setting ultrasound often unavailable , last menstrual date uncertain , physical/neurological scoring complex . The disappearance anterior lens capsule vascularity ( ALCV ) , normal embryological process , high correlation gestational age delivery among preterm neonate . We use observational method-comparison study establish validity smartphone ophthalmoscope ALCV gestational age estimate among preterm infant delivery compare referent standard ultrasound gestational age estimate . Study objectives method include follow : Objective 1 . Develop ALCV biomarker dataset smartphone ophthalmoscope image use automated image analysis software . The dataset include image feature include : vessel quantity , lens clearing , tortuosity , vessel thickness , branch angle coefficient . Methods : ( 1 ) capture ALCV image via smartphone ophthalmoscope within 24 hour delivery , ( 2 ) segment ALCV image use software develop assessment retinal vasculature . Proposed software convert image graph automatically find vasculature base Dijkstra 's shortest-path algorithm . The propose software test video-indirect neonatal ophthalmoscope image . Objective 2 . Develop algorithm predict gestational age delivery 26 42 week ' gestation ALCV biomarker dataset combine key neonatal biophysical measure . Methods : ( 1 ) conduct descriptive univariate analysis predictor assess linear model assumption , ( 2 ) fit constrain linear regression model select shrink estimate model coefficient fully specify model original sample optimize predictive accuracy model parsimony . Objective 3 . Assess performance ALCV gestational age estimate compare referent standard ultrasound estimate . Methods : ( 1 ) compare distribution gestational age mean difference day date method , ( 2 ) test agreement date method use Lin 's concordance correlation coefficient Bland-Altman plot limit agreement ( 3 ) internally validate test agreement use bootstrap procedure optimism correction agreement statistic . All statistical analysis perform SAS 9.4 ( SAS , Cary , North Carolina , USA ) .
DOC.criteria: Gestational age 260/7 426/7 week ( base antenatal ultrasound < 20 week gestation ) Chronological age < 24 hour Consent patient 's parent legal guardian Fused eyelid Corneal opacity cataract Obstetrical ultrasound perform < 20 week ' gestation performed/not available Known genetic/congenital anomaly Known coagulopathies Patients , opinion attend physician clinical study staff , medically unstable participate study safely
